title: Tamara's World
overview: Formula One heiress and entrepreneur Tamara Ecclestone invites viewers into her life in Tamara's World. Across six programmes, Tamara and husband Jay Rutland allow cameras exclusive access into their extraordinary world with three year daughter Sophia.Featuring an intimate insight into the couple's opulent life, the programme follows Tamara and Jay as they travel around the world by private jet, run a Â£70m Kensington home and throw expensive parties for friends and family. It also reveals those private down-to-earth family moments that Tamara and Jay enjoy with Sophia - just ordinary family time in extraordinary surroundings.
